recommended_degree: Administrasi Pajak, Akuntansi, Akuntansi Keuangan, Akuntansi Manajemen Pemerintahan, Ekonomi (Sarjana)
job_description:
I. Achievement of business unit operation targets:
1. Execute the Manage Finance process in generating the budget and monthly forecast.
2. Manage project accounting data, understand project reporting data, and provide project financial reports in a timely and accurate manner.
3. Manage project revenue, cost and expense, inventory, and AR. Monitor the health status of each item through forecasting.
4. Manage project risks and assumptions, and track project budget and rolling forecast execution to effectively manage project operation risks.
II. Financial support:
1. Act as the financial partner of project teams and cooperate with the project manager to evaluate different channal company and customer's financial ability. Input financial insight to support the business. 
2. Act as the financial partner of project teams and help solve problems relating to cash advance management, reimbursement, supplier payment, and money advanced to support the operations of project teams.
